Crimes.Crime_Name: Misrepresentation under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the Board erred in rejecting the applicant's identity documents without proper evidentiary basis
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Applicant's explanations inconsistent with official procedures; credibility undermined
Evidence_Type: Country information on document issuance practices
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Refugee protection based on fear of persecution
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Inconsistencies in document acquisition explanations and country conditions
Crimes.Proceeding_Type: Refugee protection hearing and subsequent judicial review
Crimes.Application_Error: Failure to provide reasonable explanation for document issuance
Crimes.Assessment_Standard: Documents presumed authentic unless evidence suggests otherwise
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Reasonable apprehension of bias and reasonableness standard of review
Crimes.Application_Factor: Personal application requirement for Chinese identity documents
Crimes.Decision_Outcome: Claim rejected due to failure to establish identity
Crimes.Authority: Immigration and Refugee Board of Canada
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Reasonableness of credibility and authenticity findings
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Use of potentially fraudulent documents and lack of credible explanation
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Discrepancies between applicant’s account and official document issuance procedures
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Board provided adequate opportunity to explain discrepancies
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge to reasonableness of Board's adverse credibility finding
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Burden of proof on claimant to establish identity
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to explain implausible document acquisition

Crimes.Crime_Type: Human Rights Violations and Serious International Law Offenses
Crimes.Grounds_for_Claim: Refugee protection based on fear of persecution
Crimes.Remedy_Requested: Recognition as Convention refugee or person in need of protection
Crimes.Evidence_Requirement: Credible documentation or plausible explanation for lack thereof
Crimes.Decision_Outcome: Claim dismissed due to fraudulent documents
Crimes.Institutional_Action: Rejection of identity documents by IRB
Crimes.Government_Body_or_Authority: Immigration and Refugee Board of Canada
Crimes.Assessment_Standard: Presumption of authenticity rebutted by inconsistencies and country evidence
Crimes.State_Protection_Assessment: Not reached due to credibility issues
Crimes.Risk_Factor: Alleged risk upon return to China
Crimes.Credibility: Found not credible due to use of counterfeit documents
Crimes.Risk_Nature: Speculative due to lack of credible basis
Crimes.Enforcement_Action: Refusal of refugee claim and dismissal of judicial review
Crimes.Legal_Basis: Possession and submission of counterfeit identity documents

Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the Board erred in rejecting the applicant's identity documents as fraudulent
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Applicant failed to explain inconsistencies; deemed not credible
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Refugee status based on alleged fear of persecution
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Implausible acquisition methods and known ease of counterfeiting in China
Crimes.Proceeding_Type: Refugee protection proceeding and judicial review
Crimes.Application_Error: Failure to meet burden of proof on document authenticity
Crimes.Assessment_Standard: Presumption of authenticity overcome by contradictory evidence
Crimes.Application_Factor: First-generation RIC and personal application requirements
Crimes.Decision_Outcome: Claim dismissed due to fraudulent documentation
Crimes.Authority: Immigration and Refugee Board of Canada
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Validity of credibility and fraud findings
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Submission of fraudulent documents to support nationality and claim
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Contradictions between testimony and official procedures
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Opportunity given to explain but explanation found inadequate
Crimes.Document_Fraud: RIC considered counterfeit due to generation type and forgery prevalence
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Serious doubts about truthfulness due to document fraud
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge to sufficiency of evidence supporting fraud finding
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Failure to substantiate identity under regulatory framework
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to provide verifiable documentation or valid excuse
Crimes.Grounds_for_Inadmissibility: Misrepresentation and use of fraudulent documents
